name: Verify Program , Market Segment and Entity ID columns are shown in all reports for Policy Overview

testSteps.description: 1: Verify Program , Market Segment and Entity ID columns are shown in all reports for Policy Overview ({Reports=Inforce Policies})

children.description: Given underwriter is on home page of PAS
And select Reports 'Inforce Policies' from Policy

Then below columns should be visible in the Policy Overview report screen
| Program |
| Market Segment |
| Entity ID |

testSteps.description: 2: Verify Program , Market Segment and Entity ID columns are shown in all reports for Policy Overview ({Reports=Suspended Policies})

children.description: Given underwriter is on home page of PAS
And select Reports 'Suspended Policies' from Policy

Then below columns should be visible in the Policy Overview report screen
| Program |
| Market Segment |
| Entity ID |

testSteps.description: 3: Verify Program , Market Segment and Entity ID columns are shown in all reports for Policy Overview ({Reports=Cancelled Policies})

children.description: Given underwriter is on home page of PAS
And select Reports 'Cancelled Policies' from Policy

Then below columns should be visible in the Policy Overview report screen
| Program |
| Market Segment |
| Entity ID |

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given underwriter is on home page of PAS
And user Navigates to Reports
And select Policy 'Policy' from Reports
And select Reports '<Reports>' from Policy
Then below columns should be visible in the Policy Overview report screen
